pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calibration Bands // Package to assess the calibration of probabilistic classifiers using confidence bands for monotonic functions. Besides testing the classical goodness-of-fit null hypothesis of perfect calibration, the confidence bands calculated within that package facilitate inverted goodness-of- fit tests whose rejection allows for a sought-after conclusion of a sufficiently well-calibrated model. The package creates flexible graphical tools to perform these tests. For construction details see also Dimitriadis, Dmbgen, Henzi, Puke, Ziegel (2022) arXiv:2203.04065.
